column4: Hi I just installed thunderbird 3.1. When I fetch my mails from the pop3 account (secure connection) I get the following alert: "Error getting mail password."
any idea how to fix this?
Hi I just installed thunderbird 3.1. When I fetch my mails from the pop3 account (secure connection) I get the following alert: "Error getting mail password." Any idea how to fix this?
anyone?
did you type in your password? :)
I did for thunderbird 3.0
then I simply removed tb 3.0 and installed tb 3.1
what do you mean?
what do I need to do?
where can I type the passwords?
you said you were using the previous version of tb, didn't you type in any passwords before?
yes in the previous version
and after having typed them in I can't type them in anymore
since the "master password service"/whatever  is dealing with it
ok i think you have to remove it completely
remove what?
remove tb
hope that works, if it doesn't you need to completely remove tb (incl. folder[s]) and reinstall it so that you're beginning from zero
that's not an option
I have like 100 folders with over 50'000 sorted mails/etc and several hundred rules
ah because you need the received mails huh?
